title: A
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''a''' will show the [[abilities]] menu.
*Pressing '''A''' list your current abilities and [[mutations]]

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''a''' represents an [[List of insects#Ants|ant]]-type monster.
*'''A''' represents an [[angel]]-type monster.
